description:
The Swix Sawyer Beanie is a winter hat that features a Scandinavian snowflake pattern and a cozy warmth. It is made of a soft acrylic/merino wool blend that provides itch-free comfort, warmth and moisture management.

  • It has a UPF 30 fabric that shields you from harmful UV rays, and a thin PrimaLoft® fleece lining that adds warmth and wicks moisture
name: Swix Sawyer Beanie - Unisex
